mapper.select: select a.VISIT_FLOW,a.MODULE_CODE,a.PROJ_FLOW,b.VISIT_NAME,c.PROJ_NO,c.PROJ_NAME,c.PROJ_SHORT_NAME from PDSCI.EDC_VISIT_MODULE a,PDSCI.EDC_VISIT b,PDSCI.PUB_PROJ c where a.MODULE_CODE=#{moduleCode} and a.VISIT_FLOW =b.VISIT_FLOW and a.PROJ_FLOW =c.PROJ_FLOW and a.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and b.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and c.RECORD_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY a.PROJ_FLOW,b.ORDINAL

select a.VISIT_FLOW,a.ELEMENT_CODE,a.PROJ_FLOW,b.VISIT_NAME,c.PROJ_NO,c.PROJ_NAME,c.PROJ_SHORT_NAME from PDSCI.EDC_VISIT_ELEMENT a,PDSCI.EDC_VISIT b,PDSCI.PUB_PROJ c where a.ELEMENT_CODE=#{elementCode} and a.VISIT_FLOW =b.VISIT_FLOW and a.PROJ_FLOW =c.PROJ_FLOW and a.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and b.RECORD_STATUS='Y' and c.RECORD_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY a.PROJ_FLOW,b.ORDINAL
